channel.title: Mohit Sharma
channel.description: Mohit Sharma is mostly a CS grad student.

item.title: Path Finder
item.description: An iOS app for exploring different path finding algorithms and associated heuristics. I've implemented BFS, A*, weighted-A*, Hierarchical-A* and Jump Point Search. The algorithms have been implemented in both Objective-C and Swift, hence you can mix and match as you please.

item.title: Hide Retarded News
item.description:
Long time ago, I was fed up with Google News showing me crap entertainment news even though I had customized it to filter these out. Out of this frustration, I created a script that allows me to remove selective Google News links by adding a

Hide News link below each news item.

item.title: Vim to play Music.
item.description: A silly little script to search and play a song in Vim using YouTube and VLC.
